title: Jane Fraser (executive)
deleted: In December 2020, Fraser delivered her thoughts in a conversation moderated by Sopnendu Mohanty, Chief FinTech Officer, [[Monetary Authority of Singapore]] virtually at the [[Singapore FinTech Festival]] on the topic, ''“How will the Financial Services Sector Respond in 2021”''. Fraser stated [[Singapore]] remains an important hub for the Citigroup since it’s also a hub of innovation, with the bank to open the world's largest wealth advisory hub in the city-state in December.<ref name=BT>{{Cite web|url=https://www.businesstimes.com.sg/banking-finance/sff-x-switch-2020/singapore-is-important-hub-for-citi-says-incoming-ceo-jane-fraser|title=Singapore is important hub for Citi, says incoming CEO Jane Fraser|access-date=December 14, 2020|work=[[Business Times (Singapore)]]|date=December 8, 2020}}</ref>
